**Summary**
The Fifth Horseman is a choose-your-own-adventure game, set in a fantasy-medieval world, where you will experience many unique stories. After years of war, hunger and diseases mankind finds itself on the verge of extinction and it's up to you to decide its fate.

**Video:** [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=frnuKnty28Q](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=frnuKnty28Q)
 
**Game Description**
You wake up in an apocalyptic world with no memories of your past. You feel an energy drawing you to the city of Eden, the last city on Earth. Throughout your journey you must discover who you are and also unravel the mysteries of the city.
 
![Alt text](https://media.indiedb.com/cache/images/games/1/71/70638/thumb_620x2000/ss_367ecdc44bfa81286be39736e63aa40c5.jpg)

**About me**
My name is Angelo Parodi and I've been working on this game for the past few months on my free time. This is the first game I develop all by myself and the first one I release on Steam.

My game is available on Steam and it would mean a lot to me if you could take a look!

**Steam:** [https://store.steampowered.com/app/1048090/](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1048090/)

Thank you for your time and have a great day!
